scripts.ng.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo-ng && npm link nativescript-tb-material && cd ../src
scripts.ng.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo-ng && npm i && cd ../src && npm run ng.plugin.link
scripts.ng.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo-ng && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.ng.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo-ng && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.ng.demo.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-ng && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.ng.demo.ios.tb: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-ng && tns run ios --syncAllFiles --device 02115eaad23eb633e24815b7d5dcd59c80ee68e0 --provision 0c8df4e2-e213-4306-88da-02de0b002e6f
scripts.ng.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-ng && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.ng.plugin.prepare: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-ng && tns plugin remove nativescript-tb-material && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.ng.clean: cd ../demo-ng && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && rimraf node_modules && npm run ng.plugin.link
